landing.title: Maktab AI
landing.headline: Manage Your School with Artificial Intelligence
landing.subheadline: An all-in-one platform to manage students, staff, and finances with AI-powered efficiency. Focus on education, we'll handle the rest.
landing.featuresSubtitle: Our platform offers a comprehensive solution to streamline all aspects of your educational institution's management.
landing.feature1Desc: Manage complete records for students and staff, from admission and hiring to archiving, all in one centralized location.
landing.feature2Desc: Easily track fees, balances, expenses, and generate insightful financial reports to keep your institution on a solid footing.
landing.feature3Desc: Gain a comprehensive, bird's-eye view of your school's most important metrics and generate reports with a single click.
landing.aiCardDesc: Get instant summaries and financial reports on debtors and school performance, saving you hours of manual work.
landing.howItWorksSubtitle: Get started in three simple steps and transform your school management overnight.
landing.step1Desc: Create your account and set up your school profile in minutes.
landing.step2Desc: Easily import or manually add student, staff, and financial information.
landing.step3Desc: Use the intuitive dashboard and AI tools to manage operations and gain insights.
